description: ovoid shape, open at center; Impressionistic style; nude figures of various sizes and dogs; some shrub or rock forms; four small basins at "corners"
text: An identical example of Park Circle Summer Frolic, intended to be a centerpiece, was in Vollard's personal collection. Its decorative quality demonstrates the belief of Bonnard and his fellow artists, the Nabis, that art should be integrated into everyday life.
title: Park Circle Summer Frolic
